summary:
This is a small companion pack I have created. It includes three NPCs which can be selected as companions.
They are all located within Whiterun Bannered Mare.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small companion pack I have created. It includes three NPCs which can be selected as companions.
They are all located within Whiterun Bannered Mare.

- Smasher: Barbarian
- Arythilus: Fighter
- Kejuihit: Ranger

In the future, more companions will be added in future versions, along with any other changes/additions that may be made.

All the companions are now essential as of version 1.1, so they should not die.

They act like any other companion, you can give them your stuff to hold if you\'re running low on space, and will fully fight for you.

Any feedback will be appreciated, it can help improve the mod and inform me of any bugs.
author: cd2134

files.name: Starter Companion Pack_New
files.changelogHtml:
Reduced Ranger\'s arrow count from 3000 to 500
Made all companions essential
